name: COVID19ICD10PCSValueSetForAdministrationOfVasopressor
title: COVID19 ICD10PCS Value Set for Administration of Vasopressor
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains terms related to vasopressor administration.),(Data Element Scope: ),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes introduction of vasopressorss into central or peripheral veins and arteries via open or percutaneous routes.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes administration of any specified vasopressor and routes of administration that do not involve open or percutaneous procedures (i.e. oral administration).)
